topics.body: ERRYBODY GET UP

God damn it.  The Ebola outbreak in Africa is probably going to continue to get way worse.  If you're wondering why basically the people quarantined give no shits and are storming through quarantine barriers.  Being quarantined sucks but you're already infected folks; breaking out of quarantine only infects more people.  It sounds really mean and cruel, but if there was a outbreak in the USA as well and there was a outbreak in your neighborhood you would get your butt quarantined as well.

This is why I think the ebola outbreak is going to get bad because no one seems to give a shit about quarantine procedures in the infected countries.

topics.body: So reading up on the Ebola outbreak; this shit's about to get bad.  The area that is currently in quarantine has 70k people and potentially up to 30k of them may become infected soon.  That's the same area that is breaking through quarantine procedures and making a run for it i.e. we're potentially going to have tens of thousands of fearful people breaking quarantine infecting others.

topics.body:
"@Ore-O":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f51a1263687250c0820000#post_53f51a1263687250c0820000
Don't know; this shit is probably gonna get bad.  If they could contain the outbreak they could stop it but ever since the outbreak started people have constantly been ignoring quarantine procedures and breaking quarantine.

You can call me a pessimist all you want, but if 0 fucks are given for containing the outbreak then chances are it's not going to end well.
